sections.text: anuvAkaM-1

BadraM karṇEBiH̍ śRuṇuyAma# dEvAH| BadraM paśyEmAqkśhaBir̍ yajatrAH|̍ sthiraira~ggai̱stuśhTuvAṃ sastanUBi̍H|̍ vyaśEma̍ dEvahitaM̍ ~MyadAyuH|̍ | svasti na indrO# vRuddhaśravAH|̍ svasti naH̍ pUśhA viśvavEdAH|̍ svasti nastArkśhyO ariśhTanEmiH|̍ svasti nO bRuhaspatir-dadhAtu|̍ | ApamApAmapaH̍ sarvA̱H| asmA-dasmA-ditO&mutaH|̍ 1 (10)

agnirvAqyuśca sUryaśca|̍ saha sa~jca-skararddhi̍yA|̍ | vAqyvaśvA# raśmipatayaH|̍ marI̱cyAtmAnO adruhaH|̍ dEvIr Buvana̍ sUvarIH|̍ putravattvAya# mE suta| | mahAnAmnIr-mahAmAqnAH|̍ mahasO mahasaH̍ svaH|̍ dEvIH parjanya̍ sUvarIH|̍ putravattvAya# mE suta| | 2 (10)

apAśnyuśhṇi-mapA̍ rakśhaH|̍ apAśnyuśhṇi-mapA̍ raGa̱M| apA̱GrAqmapa# cAqvarti̱M| apa# dEvIritO hita|̍ | vajraM̍ dEvIrajItAṅśca|̍ BuvanaM̍ dEvasUvarIH|̍ AqdityAnaditiM̍ dEvIM| yOninOrddhva-mudIśha̍ta|̍ | śivA naH śantamA̍ Bavantu| divyA Apa OśhadhayaH(̍ )| sumRuDIkA sarasvati|̍ mA tE vyOma̍ sandRuśi|̍ | 3 (12)
anuvAkaM-2

smRutiH̍ pratyakśha-maitihya̱M|̍ anumAna-ścatuśhTayaM|̍ EtairAditya̍ maṇDalaM| sarvairEva̍ vidhA̱syatE| | sUryO marIcimAda̍ttE|̍ sarvasmA̱d BuvanAdadhi|̍ tasyAH pAka viśEśhEṇa|̍ smRutaM kAla̍ viśEśhaṇaM|̍ | nadIva praBavAt̍ kAqcit| akśhayyA̱th syandatE yathA|̍ 4 (10)

tAnnadyO&Bi samAyanti|̍ sOruH satI# na nivartatE|̍ | EvannAqnA samutthAqnAH|̍ kAqlAH sam~Mvathsaraṅ̍ śritAH|̍ aṇuśaśca mahaśaśca|̍ sarvE# samavayantri# taM| | sa tai̱H sarvaiH samAviśhTaH|̍ UruH sanna̍ nivartatE|̍ adhi sam~MvathsaraM̍ ~MvidyAt| tadEva# lakśhaṇE| | 5 (10)

aṇuBiśca mahadBiśca|̍ samArUDhaH̍ pradRuśyatE|̍ sam~MvathsaraH pratyakśhEṇa|̍ nAqdhisattvaH̍ pradRuśyatE|̍ | paTarO# viklidhaH̍ pi~ggaH| Etad varuṇa̍ lakśhaṇaM|̍ yatraita-dupadRuśya̍tE|̍ sahasraM̍ tatra nIyatE|̍ | Ekaṃ hi śirO nAnA̍ muKE| kRuthsnaM tadRuta̍ lakśhaṇaM|̍ 6 (10)

uBayataH saptE̱ndriyAqṇi| jalpitaM̍ tvEva dihyatE|̍ | śuklakRuśhṇE sam~Mvathsarasya|̍ dakśhiṇa vAmayOH̍ pAqrśvayOH| tasyaiśhA Bavati|̍ | śukraM tE# anyadyajataM̍ tE# anyat| viśhurUpE̍ ahanI̍ dyaurivAsi|̍ viśvAq hi mAqyA avasi̍ svadhAvaH| BadrA tE# pUśhanniha rAqtirastviti|̍ | nAtra BuvanaM̍ ( )| na pUśhA| na paśavaH|̍ nAdityaH sam~Mvathsara Eva pratyakśhEṇa priyatamaM̍ ~MvidyAt| Etadvai sam~Mvathsarasya priyatamaṃ̍ rUpaM| yO&sya mahAnartha utpathsyamAnO̍ Bavati| idaM puṇyaM kuruśhvEti|̍ tamAharaṇaM̍ dadyAt| | 7 (17) (yathAq - lakśhaṇa - Rutulakśha̍ṇaM̍ - Buvanaṃ̍ sapta ca# (A2)
anuvAkaM-3

sAqka~jjAnAṃ# saptathamAhu-rEkajaM|̍ śhaDudyamA̍ RuśhayO̍ dEvajA iti|̍ tEśhAmiśhTAni̍ vihitAni̍ dhAmaśaH| sthAqtrE rEjantE̍ vikRutAni̍ rUpaśaH| | kOnu# maryAq amithitaH|̍ saKAq saKAyamabravIt|̍ jahAkO̍ asmadIśhatE|̍ | yastityAja# saKividaṃq saKAyaM|̍ na tasya# vAqcyapi# BAqgO asti|̍ yadIṃ# śRuṇOtyalakaṃ# śRuṇOti| 8 (10)

na hi pravEda# sukRutasya panthAqmiti|̍ | Rutuṛ RutunA̍ nudyamAnaH|̍ vinanAdAqBidhA̍vaH|̍ śhaśhTiśca triṃśakA̍ valgAH| śuklakRuśhṇau̍ ca śhAśhTikau|̍ | sAqrAqgavastrair-jaradakśhaH|̍ vasantO vasuBiH̍ saha| sam~Mvathsarasya# savituH| praiśhakRut prathamaH̍ smRutaH|̍ | amUnAqdaya-tEtyanyAn|̍ 9 (10)

amUṅśca# parirakśhataH|̍ EtA vAqcaH prayujyantE|̍ yatrai tadupadRuśya̍tE|̍ | EtadEva vijAnIyAt|̍ pramAṇaM̍ kAlaparyayE|̍ viśEśhaṇaM tu# vakśhyAqmaH| RutUnA̱M tannibOdhata|̍ | śuklavAsA# rudragaṇaH| grIśhmEṇAvartatE̍ saha|̍ nijahan̍ pRuthivIṃ̍ sarvAM| 10 (10)

jyOtiśhA̱ &pratiKyEna# saH| | viśvarUpAṇi# vAsAqṃqsi| AqdityAnA̱M nibOdhata|̍ sam~MvathsarIṇaM̍ karmaPalaM| vaṛ śhABir dadatAqṃq̍ saha| | aduHKO# duHKa cakśhuriva|̍ tadmA# pIta iva dRuśyatE|̍ śItEnA̱ vyathayanniva|̍ rurudakśha̍ iva dRuśyatE|̍ | hlAdayatE̱ jvalataścaiva̍ ( )| śAqmyataścAsya̍ cakśhuśhI|̍ yAvai prajA BraṅśyantE|̍ sam~MvathsarAttA BraṅśyantE|̍ | yAqH pratitiśhThanti|̍ saM~MvathsarE tAH pratitiśhThanti|̍ vaqrq. śhABya# ityarthaH| | 11 (16)
anuvAkaM-4

akśhiduHKOtthi̍tasyaiva|̍ viprasannE̍ kanInikE|̍ A~gktE cAdgaṇaM̍ nAqsti| RuBUṇA̱M tannibOdhata|̍ | kanakAqBAni# vAsAqṃqsi| ahatAni̍ nibOdhata|̍ annamaśrnIta# mRujmIta| ahaM ~MvO# jIvanapradaH|̍ | EtA vAqcaH prayujyantE|̍ śaradyatrOpa̍ dRuśyatE|̍ 12 (10)

aBidhUnvantO-&BiGnanta̍ iva| vAqtavantO̍ marudgaṇAH|̍ | amutO jEtumiśhumuKamiva|̍ sannaddhAH saha dadRuśE̍ ha| apaddhvastair-vastivarṇairiva|̍ viśiKAsaH̍ kapardinaH| | akruddhasya yOthsyamAnasya|̍ kRuddhasyEva̍ lOhinI|̍ hEmataścakśhuśhI̍ vidyAt| akśhṇayO̱H kśhipaṇOriva|̍ | 13 (10)

durBikśhaM dEvalOkEśhu|̍ manUnAmudakaM̍ gRuhE|̍ EtA vAqcaH pravadantIH|̍ vaidyutO# yAnti śaiśirIH|̍ | tA agniH pavamAnAq̍ anvai̱kśhata| iha jIvikAma-pa̍ripaśyann|̍ tasyaiśhA Bavati|̍ | ihEha vaH̍ svatapasaH| marutaH̍ sUryatvacaH|̍ śarma# saprathAq AvRuṇE̍ ( )| | 14 (10)
anuvAkaM-5

ati# tAqmrAṇi# vAsAqṃqsi| aśhTivajri̍ śataGni# ca| viśvE dEvA vipraharanti|̍ agnijihva̍ asaścata|̍ | naiva dEvO# na martyaH| na rAjA varuṇO̍ viBuH| nAgnir nEndrO na pavamAqnaH|̍ mAqtRukkacca̍ na vidyatE|̍ | divyasyaikAq dhanurArtniH|̍ pRuthivyAmaparA̍ śritA| 15 (10)

tasyEndrO vamrirUpEṇa|̍ dhanurjyA-maCinathsva̍yaM|̍ | tadindradhanu̍rityajyaM|̍ aBravarṇEśhu̍ cakśhatE|̍ EtadEva śam~MyOr-bAṛ haspatyasya|̍ Etad rudrasya̍ dhanuH| | rudrasya# tvEva dhanurArtniH|̍ śira utpipEśha|̍ sa pravargyO̍&Bavat|̍ tasmAqd yaH sapravargyEṇa̍# yajñEna yajatE̍ ( )| rudrasya sa śiraH pratidadhAti|̍ nainaṃ# rudra ArukO̍ Bavati| ya EvaM ~MvEda|̍ | 16 (13)
anuvAkaM-6

atyUrddhvAqkśhO&tiraścAt|̍ śiśiraH̍ pradRuśyatE|̍ naiva rUpaM na# vAsAqṃqsi| na cakśhuH̍ pratidRuśyatE|̍ | anyOnyaM tu na# hiṅsrAqtaH| sata stad̍ dEvalakśhaṇaM|̍ lOhitO&kśhṇi śAraśIrśhṇiH|̍ sUryasyOdayanaM̍ prati|̍ | tvaM karOśhi# nya~jjalikAM| tvaM karOśhi̍ nijAnukAM|̍ 17 (10)

nijAnukAmE̱ nya~jjalikA| amI vAca-mupAsatAmiti|̍ | tasmai sarva RutavO# namantE| maryAdA karatvAt prapurOdhAM|̍ brAhmaṇa# ApnOti| ya EvaM̍ ~MvEda| sa Kalu sam~Mvathsara EtaiH sEnAnIBiH̍ saha| indrAya sarvAn-kAmAnaBivahati|̍ sa draqPsaH| tasyaiśhA Bavati|̍ | 18 (10)

ava# draPsO aṃśamatI̍matiśhThat|̍ iyAqnaH kRuśhṇO daśaBiH̍ sahasrai̱H| Avarta-mindraH śacyAq dhamantaM|̍ upasnuhi taM nRumaṇA-mathadrAmiti|̍ | Etayai vEndraH salA vRukyA̍ saha| asurAn parivRuścati|̍ pRuthivyaṃq̍ śumatI|̍ tAmanva-vasthitaH̍ sam~MvathsarO diva~jca|̍ naivaM ~MviduśhA-&&cAryA̱n tEvAqsinau| anyOnyasmai̱ druhyAqtAM ( )| yO druhyati| BraśyatE svargAl̍ lOkAt| ityatu maṇDalAqni|̍ sUrya maṇDalA̱ nyAKyAqyikAH| ata UrddhvaṃsanirvacanAH|̍ | 19 (15)
anuvAkaM-7

ArOgO BrAjaH paTaraH̍ pata~ggaH| svarṇarO jyOtiśhImAn.̍ viBAqsaH| tE asmai sarvE divamAtapanti|̍ UrjaM duhAnA anapasPuranta̍ iti| | kaśyapO&śhTamaH|̍ sa mahAmEruM na# jahAqti| tasyaiśhA Bavati|̍ | yattE śilpaM̍ kaśyapa rOcanAvat|̍ indriyAvat̍ puśhkalaM citraBAnu|̍ yasmin thsUryAq arpitAH̍ sapta sAqkaM| 20 (10)

tasmin rAjAna-madhiviśrayEmamiti|̍ | tE asmai sarvE kaśyapA-jjyOtir̍ -laBantE| tAnthsOmaH kaśyapAdadhi# nirddhamati| BrastA karma kRudivaivaM|̍ | prAṇO jIvAnIndriya# jIvAqni| sapta śIṛ śhaṇyAH̍ prAqṇAH| sUryA ityAcAqryAH|̍ | apaśyamaha mEtAnth sapta sU̱ryAniti| pa~jcakarṇO# vAthsyAqyanaH| saptakarṇaśca̍ plAqkśhiH| 21 (10)

Anuśravika Eva nau kaśyapa̍ iti| uBau# vEdayitE| na hi śEkumiva mahAmEruM̍ gantuM| | apaśyamahamEtath sUryamaṇDalaM parivartamAqnaM|̍ gAqrgyaH prAṇatrAqtaH|̍ gacCanta mahAmEruM|̍ Eka~jcAjahataM|̍ | BrAjapaTara pata~ggA̍ nihanE| tiśhThannAtapanti|̍ tasmAdiha̍ taptri# tapAH| 22 (10)

amutrEtarE| tasmAdihA̍ taptri# tapAH| | tEśhAmEśhAq̍ Bavati|̍ | sapta sUryAq diva-manu praviśhTAH|̍ tAnanvEti# pathiBir̍ dakśhiṇAvAn|̍ tE asmai sarvE GRutamAtapanti|̍ UrjaM duhAnA anapasPuranta̍ iti| | saptartvijaH sUryA ityAcAqryAH|̍ | tEśhAmEśhAq̍ Bavati|̍ | sapta diśO nAnA# sUryAH| 23 (10)

sapta hOtAra̍ RutvijaH|̍ dEvA AdityA# yE sapta| tEBiH sOmABI rakśhaṇa̍ iti| | tadapyAmnAqyaH|̍ digBrAja RutU̱n karOti| | EtayaivAqvRutA̍ &&sahasrasUryatAyA iti vaiśampAqyanaH|̍ | tasyaiśhA Bavati|̍ | yaddyAva# indra tE śataṃ śataM BUmI̱H| uta syuH| na tvA# vajrinth sahasraṃq sUryA̱H ( )| 24 (10)

anu na jAtamaśhTa rOdasI̍ iti| | nAnA li~ggatvA-dRutUnAM nAnA# sUryatvaM| | aśhTau tu vyavasitA̍ iti| | sUryamaṇDalA-nyaśhTAta̍ UrddhvaM| | tEśhAmEśhAq̍ Bavati|̍ | citraM dEvAnAq-mudagAqdanI̍kaM|̍ cakśhur̍ mitrasya varuṇasyAqgnEH|̍ A&prAq dyAvA# pRuthivI antarikśhaM|̍ sUrya AtmA jagatastasthuśhaścEti|̍ | 25 (9)
anuvAkaM-8

kvEdamaBraM̍ niviśatE| kvAyaṃ# sam~MvathsarO mithaH|̍ kvAhaH kvEyan dEva̍ rAqtrI| kva mAsA RutavaH̍ śritAH| | arddhamAsA# muhUrtAH| nimEśhAstuTiBiH̍ (nimEśhAstraTiBiH)̍ saha| kvEmA ApO niviśantE|̍ yadItO# yAnti saMprati|̍ | kAlA aPsu niviśantE|̍ AqpaH sUryE# samAhitAH|̍ 26 (10)

aBrA̱ṇyapaH prapadyantE|̍ vidyuthsUryE# samAhitA|̍ | anavarṇE imE̍ BUmI| iya~jcAsau̍ ca rOdasI|̍ | kiṅ svidatrAntarA̍ BUtaM| yEnEmE vidhRutE̍ uBE| viśhṇunA# vidhRutE̍ BUmI| iti vathsasya̍ vEdanA|̍ | irAvatI̍ dhEnumatI hi BUtaM| sUyavasinI manuśhE̍ daśasyE̱| 27 (10)

vyaśhTaBnAq-drOda̍sI̍ viśhṇavEtE|̍ dAqdhartha# pRuthivI-maBitO# mayUKai̱H| | kinta-dviśhṇO rbalamAqhuH|̍ kAq dIptiH̍ kiM parAyaṇaM|̍ EkO# yaddhA-raya̍ ddEvaH| rEjatI# rOdasI uBE|̍ | vAtAdviśhṇOr bala̍ mAqhuH| akśharA̱d dIpti rucyatE|̍ tripadAqddhArayad̍ dEvaH| yadviśhṇOrEka-mutta̍maM|̍ | 28 (10)

(pagE 40) agnayO# vAyavaścaiva|̍ Etadasya̍ parAyaṇaM|̍ | pRucCAmi tvA paraM̍ mRutyuM| avamaM̍ maddhyama~jcatuM|̍ lOka~jca puṇyapApAqnAM|̍ Etat pRucCAmi̍ saMprati|̍ | amumAhuH̍ paraM̍ mRutyuM| pavamAnaM̍ tu maddhyamaM|̍ agnirEvAvamO̍ mRutyuH| candramA̱-ścaturucyatE|̍ | 29 (10)

anAqBOgAH paraM̍ mRutyuM| pAqpAH sam~Myanti̍ sarvadA|̍ ABOgAstvEva# sam~Myanti| yatra puṇyakRutO̍ janAH|̍ | tatO# maddhyamamAyanti|̍ catumagni~jca̍ saMprati|̍ | pRucCAmi tvA# pApakRutaH| yatra yAtayatE̍ yamaH|̍ tvannastad -brahman̍ prabrUhi| yadi vE̱tthA&satO gRuhAn|̍ | 30 (10)

kaśyapA# duditAH̍ sUryAH| pAqpAnnirGnanti̍ sarvadA|̍ rOdasyOrantar̍ dEśEśhu| tatra nyasyantE# vAsavaiH| | tE &śarIrAH prapadyantE|̍ yathA &puṇyasya̍ karmaṇaH|̍ apA̱ṇyapAda# kEśAqsaH| tatra tE&yOnijA̍ janAH|̍ | mRutvA punarmRutyu-mApadyantE|̍ adyamAnAH̍ svakarmaBiH|̍ 31 (10)

AśAtikAH krimaya̍ iva| tataH pUyantE# vAsavaiH| | apaitaM̍ mRutyuM jayati|̍ ya EvaM ~MvEda|̍ sa KalvaivaM̍ ~MvidbrAqhmaṇaH| dIrGaśruttamO̍ Bavati|̍ kaśyapasyAti̍thiH̍ siddhagamanaH̍ siddhAgamanaH|̍ | tasyaiśhA Bavati|̍ | Ayasmina̱-thsapta vAsavAH|̍ rOhanti̍ pUrvyA# ruhaH|̍ 32 (10)

Ruśhiṛ̍ ha dIrGaśruttamaH|̍ indrasya GarmO atithiriti|̍ | kaśyapaH paśyakO̍ Bavati| yathsarvaM paripaśyatIti̍ saukśhmyAt| | athAgnEraśhTapu̍ruśhasya|̍ tasyaiśhA Bavati|̍ | agnE naya# supathA# rAqyE asmAn| viśvAni̍ dEva vayunAni̍ vidvAn| yuyOddhyasma-jju̍hurAqṇamEna̍H|̍ BUyiśhThAntE nama uktiM ~MvidhEmEti̍ ( )| | 33 (10) samAhitA̍ - daśasyE# - uttama-mucya̍tE-gRuhAn-thsvakarma̍BiH-pUrvyA̍# ruha-iti)̍ (A8)
anuvAkaM-9

agniśca jAtavEdAqśca|̍ sahOjA ajirAqpraBuH|̍ vaiśvAnarO naryApAqśca|̍ pa~gktirAdhAśca̍ saptamaH|̍ visarpE vAśhTamO&gnInAM|̍ EtE&śhTau vasavaH kśhitA̍ iti| | yathartvE-vAgnE-rarcirvarṇa# viśEśhAH| nIlArciśca pItakA̱rciścEti| | atha vAyO-rEkAdaśa-puruśhasyaikAdaśastrIkasya|̍ | praBrAjamAnA vyavadAqtAH|̍ 34 (10)

yAśca vAsuki̍ vaidyutAH| rajatAH paruśhAH̍ śyAqmAH| kapilA atilOhitAH|̍ UrddhvA avapatantAqśca|̍ vaidyuta ityEkAqdaśa|̍ | nainaM ~MvaidyutO# hinasti| ya EvaM̍ ~MvEda| | sa hOvAca vyAsaH pArAśaryaH|̍ vidyudvadhamEvAhaM mRutyumai̱cCamiti| | na tvakAmaṃ̍ hanti| 35 (10)

ya EvaM̍ ~MvEda| | atha gandharvagaṇAH|̍ svAna BrAT| a~gGArir̍ baMBAriH|̍ hastaH suhastaH|̍ kRuśAnur̍ viśvAvasuH|̍ mUrddhanvAnth-sU̱ryavarcAH| kRutirityEkAdaśa gandharvagaṇAH|̍ | dEvAśca mahAdEvAH|̍ raśmayaśca dEvA# garagiraH| | 36 (10)

nainaM garO# hinasti| ya EvaM̍ ~MvEda| | gaurI mimAya̍ salilAni takśhatI|̍ EkapadI̍ dvipadI sA catuśhpadI|̍ aśhTApadI̍ navapadI̍ baBUvuśhI̱| sahasrAkśharA paramE vyOmanniti|̍ | vAcO# viśEśhaṇaM| | atha nigadavyAKyAqtAH|̍ tAnanukramiśhyAqmaH|̍ | varAhavaH-svatapasaH|̍ 37 (10)

vidyun mahasO̍ dhUpayaH|̍ śvApayO gRuhamEdhA̱ścEtyEtE| yE cEmE&śimividviśhaH|̍ | parjanyAH sapta pRuthivImaBivaṛ̍ śhanti| vRuśhTiBiriti|̍ Etayaiva viBakti viparItAH|̍ saptaBirvAtai# rudIritAH| amUM ~MlOkA-naBivaṛ̍ śhanti| tEśhAmEśhAq̍ Bavati|̍ | samAqna-mEtadudakaM|̍ 38 (10)

uccaityava̍ cAhaBiH|̍ BUmiM̍ parjanyAq jinvanti|̍ divaM jinvan-tyagnaya̍ iti| | yadakśharaM̍ BUtakRutaM|̍ viśvE# dEvA upAsatE|̍ mahaṛ śhimasya̍ gOptAra̱M| jamadagni-maku̍rvata|̍ | jamadagni-rApyA̍yatE|̍ CandOBi-ścaturuttaraiH|̍ rAjñaH sOmasya̍ tRuptAsaH|̍ 39 (10)

brahmaṇA̍ vIryAvatA|̍ śivA naH̍ pradiśO diśaH|̍ | tacCa~MyyOrA vRuṇImahE|̍ gAqtuM ~MyajñAya|̍ gAqtuM ~MyajñapatayE|̍ daivI̱ svastirastu̍ naH| svastir mAnuśhEByaH|̍ UrddhvaM jigAtu̍ BEśhajaM| śannO# astu dvipadE̱| śa~jcatuśhpadE̍ ( )| | sOmapA(3) asOmapA(3) iti nigadavyAKyAqtAH|̍ | 40 (11)
anuvAkaM-10

sahasravRudiyaM̍ BUmiH| paraM ~MvyOma̍ sahasravRut|̍ aśvinA# BujyU# nAsatyA| viśvasya# jagataspatI|̍ | jAyA BUmiH patirvyOma|̍ mithunantA̍ aturyathuH|̍ putrO bRuhaspatI̍ rudraH| saramA# iti# strIpumaM| | śukraM ~MvAmanyadya̍jataM̍ ~MvAmanyat|̍ viśhurUpE̍ ahanI̍ dyauriva̍ sthaH| 41 (10)

viśvAq hi mAqyA avathaH̍ svadhAvantau| BadrA vA̱M pUśhaṇAviha rAqtirastu|̍ | vAsA̱tyau citrau jagatO̍ nidhAnau̱| dyAvABUmI̍ carathaH̍ saṃq saKAyau|̍ tAvaśvinA# rAqsaBA̱śvAq havaM̍ mE| śuBaspatI Aqgataṃ# sUryayA# saha| | tyugrO# ha Bujyu-maśvinOda̍ mEGE| rayinna kaścin̍ mamRuvA~M(2) avAhAH|̍ tamUhathur-nauBirA̱tman-vatI̍BiH|̍ antarikśha pruDBira-pOdakABiH|̍ | 42 (10)
